name: Space Port Bar
description:
Made with Twine 2; runs in browser.

This is a branching dialogue between your character and an alien bartender in a space port tavern.

There are typical branching dialogue features as well as some other ideas I wanted to experiment with. For example, one section of the game has you talk about your life. The options you choose for your character get saved and are combined to form a complete short story at the end.

If you like reading, then this is for you! There are no pictures, nor visual thrills, nor any visual variety. Just white text on a black background (the Twine 2 default).

This for those of you hardcore enough to be satisfied with good words arranged creatively.
